short_summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement, on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans for Wharf Reconstruction at Port au Choix, Newfoundland and Labrador.
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement, on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans for Wharf Reconstruction at Port au Choix, Newfoundland and Labrador。
full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify: F6140-230298 - DFO Wharf Reconstruction - Port au Choix, NL

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4102227790
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4102227790
* **Publication Date:** July 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 3, 2023, 2:00:00 PM ADT
* **Procurement Category:** Construction Services
* **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify

#### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **Estimated Contract Value:** $1,000,001 to $5,000,000 CAD
* **Delivery Location:** Port au Choix, Newfoundland and Labrador
* **Expected Delivery Period:** 70 weeks from contract award

#### Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

* **Scope of Work:** The contractor must provide all necessary plant, labour, equipment, and materials for the wharf reconstruction at Port au Choix, Newfoundland and Labrador.
* **Evaluation Criteria:** The selection criteria for this tender are based on the lowest price.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** Alexandria Dwyer, Public Services and Procurement Canada
* **Email:** [alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Access to Tender Document

Please visit the following link to access the tender document: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16905362?extsite=MTY5MDUzNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16905362?extsite=MTY5MDUzNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
